00030 #define SIMULATIONTIME_HPP_
00031

00033 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00034 #include <boost/serialization/shared_ptr.hpp>
00035 #include "SerializableSingleton.hpp"
00036 #include "TimeStepper.hpp"
00037 
00048 class SimulationTime : public SerializableSingleton<SimulationTime>
00049 {
00050 public:
00051 
00056     static SimulationTime* Instance();
00057 
00065     void SetEndTimeAndNumberOfTimeSteps(double endTime, unsigned totalTimeStepsInSimulation);
00066 
00075     void ResetEndTimeAndNumberOfTimeSteps(const double& rEndTime, const unsigned& rNumberOfTimeStepsInThisRun);
00076 
00084     double GetTimeStep() const;
00085 
00091     void IncrementTimeOneStep();
00092 
00098     unsigned GetTimeStepsElapsed() const;
00099 
00105     double GetTime() const;
00106 
00115     static void Destroy();
00116 
00122     bool IsStartTimeSetUp() const;
00123 
00129     bool IsEndTimeAndNumberOfTimeStepsSetUp() const;
00130 
00131 
00135     bool IsFinished() const;
00136 
00142     void SetStartTime(double startTime);
00143 
00144 protected:
00151     SimulationTime();
00152 
00153 private:
00157     static SimulationTime* mpInstance;
00158 
00159 
00163     static boost::shared_ptr<TimeStepper> mpTimeStepper;
00164 
00168     double mStartTime;
00169 
00170 
00172     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00173 
00182     template<class Archive>
00183     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00184     {

00186         archive & mpTimeStepper;
00187     }
